objects.name: Analytic 0486
objects.description: Forged cookies on macOS may show up as abnormal access to Safari/Chrome cookie databases in ~/Library/Cookies, combined with unexpected logon sessions authenticated by those cookies. Unified Logs may show cookie injection events or abnormal access patterns to Keychain when linked to browser authentication flows.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Abnormal process access to Safari or Chrome cookie storage

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: New session initiated using cookies without normal MFA or password validation

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Applications permitted to use Keychain to generate cookies or tokens.
